description: A collection of circles in a large roughly triangular formation pointing downwards; there is a smaller triangular formation of circles pointing upwards above the larger one, as well as a capital Y-shaped formation extending outwards from the right side of the larger triangular formation and a thin ovular formation of circles below. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a very dark green triangle at the bottom of the smaller triangular formation and a pale tan triangle at the top of the thin ovular formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
